page.title: 20LEISURE-GOSPORT,SOUTH-WEST.
page.content:
The local{beaches}are popular places for{swimming,sailing}and relaxation. Gosport itself offers an {Indoor Pool}and{Sports Centre,}whilst near-neighbour Fareham boasts an extensive new{shopping precinct}and a new{Indoor Swimming Pool complex. It is an interesting area with{good {facilities, scenic views}and easy access to a variety of attractions and beauty spots.
Schools involved in this compilation of data are: GRANGE JUNIOR SCHOOL. HOLBROOK JUNIOR SCHOOL. LEE-ON-THE-SOLENT JUNIOR SCHOOL. PEEL COMMON JUNIOR SCHOOL. ROWNER JUNIOR SCHOOL.
